name: reattempt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to try to do something again: Reboot the PC, and re-attempt the activation. We will reattempt to collect the outstanding payment in 5 working days.
More examplesFewer examplesYou will need to re-format your system drive before reattempting to log on.There are currently no plans to re-attempt to sell the business. She reattempts the science challenge each year.I reattempted the muffins with the correct flour, and the results were great.
